title: EchoPulse Pro Headphones
description: Flagship over-ear headphones with adaptive noise cancellation, 40-hour battery, and crystal-clear audio for studio or travel.

title: EchoPulse Sport
description: Sweat and water-resistant earbuds designed for an active lifestyle. Secure fit and powerful bass to fuel your workouts.

title: Aura Headphones
description: Sleek and lightweight over-ear headphones delivering rich, detailed sound with plush ear cushions for all-day comfort.

title: Pulse Mini
description: All the power of EchoPulse in a smaller package. Perfect for all-day comfort and exceptional sound on the go.

title: Nova Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with balanced mids and punchy bass, smart touch controls, and 30 hours total battery with charging case.

title: Orion Headphones
description: Over-ear wireless headphones with hybrid active noise cancellation, 35-hour battery life, memory-foam earcups, and balanced tuning for music and calls.

title: Astro Earbuds
description: Compact true wireless earbuds featuring spatial audio, low-latency gaming mode, and IPX4 sweat resistance for workouts.

title: Nebula Headphones
description: Premium over-ear headphones with 50mm drivers, wide soundstage, and a foldable design for easy portability.

title: Supernova Earbuds
description: Flagship true wireless earbuds with adaptive EQ, high-bitrate codec support, and a premium metal charging case.

title: Voyager Headphones
description: Travel-focused active noise-cancelling over-ear headphones with 40-hour battery, compact folding hinge, and plush cushions.

title: Aurora Studio Headphones
description: Studio-grade reference over-ear headphones with ultra-flat frequency response, detachable cable, and rugged build for professionals.

title: Eclipse Earbuds
description: In-ear active noise-cancelling earbuds with hybrid ANC, ambient mode, and a secure ergonomic fit for commuting.
